We may use various methods to collect Information, including:
We use Information for the following purposes:
When we use your information for direct marketing purposes we will retain your data until you opt-out from receiving such materials, although we retain certain information to maintain a record of your request.

We provide you with various choices on how we may use Information in connection with marketing and our use of Information Technologies to serve you interests based advertisements and analyze website usage.
For example, if you fill out a form on our website, we will collect your name and email address.

We provide you with various choices on how we may use Information in connection with marketing and our use of Information Technologies to serve you interests based advertisements and analyze website usage.
For example, if you fill out a form on our website, we will collect your name and email address.
Personal data collected may also be processed by AudioCodes' employees operating outside of the EU or one of its affiliates or vendors.
AudioCodes discloses Personal Information to third parties only if they have satisfactory measures to protect Personal Information.

AudioCodes collects personal information in the interest of improving our ability to engage and educate customers, partners and business contacts by providing information relevant to AudioCodes products and services.
AudioCodes discloses Personal Information to third parties only if they have satisfactory measures to protect Personal Information.
AudioCodes transfers personal data to a third country only if the controller or processor has provided appropriate safeguards, and on condition that enforceable data subject rights and effective legal remedies for data subjects are available.
If you are a job applicant, AudioCodes processes your Personal Information pursuant to one or more of the following legal bases:

In some cases, we may need the Personal Information to protect your vital interests or those of another person.
We may also retain your Personal Information for such time needed to pursue our legitimate business interests, in connection with any legal claims and compliance with legal obligations.
We normally collect Personal Information only where: (a) we have your consent to do so, (b) where we need your Personal Information to perform a contract with you (e.g. to deliver the services you have requested), (c) where the processing is in our legitimate interests; or (d) where we are required to collect, retain or share such information under applicable laws.
We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to pursue the purpose of the collection.
